android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="com.android.vending.BILLING" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE" />
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="15" android:targetSdkVersion="19" />
<application android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.MyApp" android:allowBackup="true" >
<activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.MainActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" >
</activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.AgainLoginActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.ForgetPasswordActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.LoginActivity" android:label="@string/app_name" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.SignupActivity" android:label="@string/app_name" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.BindActivity" android:label="@string/app_name" android:launchMode="standard" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.AgreementActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.JudgeActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity>
<meta-data android:name="com.google.android.gms.version" android:value="8487000" /> <!-- 设置fb appid，修改请到ane中的sdks/ht/res/value/string.xml中修改，再打包ane --> <meta-data android:name="com.facebook.sdk.ApplicationId" android:value="@string/facebook_app_id" />
<!-- FacebookContentProvider后面要添加和上面一样的id --> <provider android:name="com.facebook.FacebookContentProvider" android:authorities="com.facebook.app.FacebookContentProvider267349303600324" android:exported="true" />
<activity android:name="com.facebook.FacebookActivity" android:configChanges="keyboard|keyboardHidden|screenLayout|screenSize|orientation" android:label="@string/app_name" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar" /> <activity android:name="com.ht.htloginsdk.activity.WebActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.l1fan.ane.ht.GPActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar.Fullscreen" > </activity>
<!-- 配置appId, 如果在代码中也传递了参数，优先取代码中参数 init start--> <meta-data android:name="appId" android:value="100000" /> <!-- 配置渠道 --> <meta-data android:name="channel" android:value="" />
<!-- 调用方法Android和iOS相同 1. 统计接口 var o:Object = new Object(); o.type = "reg"; // log/reg分别指已创建和未创建角色 o.version = ""; // 版本 ？ o.coo_server = ""; // 区服号 o.coo_uid = ""; // 角色id sdk.call("track",JSON.stringify(o));
2. facebook邀请好友方法，结果响应事件 FB_INVITE var o:Object = new Object(); o.title = "xxx"; o.message = "xxxx"; sdk.call("invite",JSON.stringify(o));
3. facebook分享方法，结果响应事件 FB_SHARE var o:Object = new Object(); o.title = "xxx"; o.message = "xxxx"; o.linkurl = ""; o.pictureurl = ""; sdk.call("share",JSON.stringify(o));
-->
</application> </manifest>
